item.description:
THURSDAY, MARCH 28, 2013 for the Spring Term – April 11 – June 13, 2013 Course

Hear what Life Force Graduates say about the course and ask questions


6pm
Raw Vegan potluck and Life Force course registration, and picking up the new 400 page text book, "Eat To Thrive."


@ Waltham Chiropractic
136 Bacon St, Waltham
For Questions or to Sign Up:
Contact Betsy Bragg at: 781-899-6664 or email at Betsy.Bragg6@gmail.com

Featured Speakers Include:
Karen Woeller: LF graduate and polarity therapist, healed herself from Breast Cancer and loved the Life Force Course so much, she wanted to share what she learned with others. After taking the course three times, she now teaches it in Northborough.


Dr. John Duffy:
LF graduate and chiropractor, learned to heal chronic ulcers and now passes on his knowledge to his patients.


Miryam Wiley:
LF graduate, now with new energy and improved health is Optimum Health Solution’s Public Relation’s Officer and Real Kids Real Food photographer and editor.

Randy Jacobs:
LF graduate and owner of Life Force Growers, distributor of wheatgrass and greens, says “Life Force Energy” teaches the powerful principles at work in life through which we discover that the body is self-healing and self-rejuvenating depending upon what you put into it.


And Others

Call Betsy at: 781-899-6664 if you have any questions of what to bring.

Please have your dish ready in a serving dish with serving utensils and its recipe (a number of attenders have allergies).
Or, buy your dinner before March 26


by clicking here (http://theveganpact.com/)


Classes will be held:
Thursdays
April 11 – June 13, 2013
6-9:30PM
(except May 16th will be May 14th)

If you miss a class, makeup in future terms: June 20-August 29
October 1 – December 10
THERE IS A $50 REFERRAL FEE OFFERED IF SOMEONE REGISTERS A FRIEND FOR THE CLASS!
Life Force Syllabus (http://bit.ly/10lEi8A)

Course Highlights
Gain hands on experience to prepare 110 mouthwatering, healthy raw recipes. See Spring Term Recipe Book.

*Learn how to achieve your ideal figure easily and naturally
*Hear from some of the world’s foremost experts on the subject of health
*Learn to grow your own sprouts, which are packed with nutrients
*Learn how to cleanse and purify yourself through fasting and detoxification
*Be inspired by the remarkable ground-breaking work of the Hippocrates founder, Ann Wigmore, and the unique lifestyle practiced and encouraged at the Hippocrates Health Institute in West Palm Beach, Florida
*Find a community of like-mined people to emphasize the lifestyle that will keep you healthy throughout your life
*Watch 26 life-changing DVDs in the comfort of your home
*FREE Two Hour Consultation to tailor the course for you
*FREE Weekly Peer Support Coaching outside of class by previously graduated Health Educators
*Opportunity to be certified as a Health Educator
*FREE new 400 page manual, EAT TO THRIVE
*FREE cardio testing using FDA non-invasive device and FREE *Chiropractic Evaluation
*For the full class syllabus visit: LIFE FORCE SYLLABUS


Location
Waltham Chiropractic
136 Bacon Street
Waltham, MA

handicapped accessible, ample parking

This is an investment in your Life
& it is tax-deductible with proceeds going to
Real Kids Real Food
Early Bird Special $490 two weeks before
(Pick up DVDs and Manual when you register)
After March 21 $535
Family member and Level II students $335 or
$290 for Early Bird Special
Level III students are FREE


To Register:
call 781-894-6664
betsy.bragg@gmail.com
WE LOOK FORWARD TO SEEING YOU THERE!
item.name: FREE POTLUCK AND INFO NIGHT FOR "EAT TO THRIVE"
